chat.script: drama_btm komaru master_maxima "Notes: Don't use ~, use Å`"
mission_message neu rasis "ALL GREEN! Mission complete! With the total result we can search for the next goal!"
drama_top komaru rasis "Hawawa! It looks like some unstable factors have made their way into Volte Academy's Program!"
drama_btm komaru right "Unstellar Factories!? ...What are those?"
drama_top neu left "Unstable factors, Right. Could they be... bugs?"
drama_btm neu rasis "I'm not sure... I'm a bit scared, so would you mind coming with me to investigate?"
drama_top komaru left "Of course. But do you know where they are?"
drama_btm neu rasis "Just a moment... It turns out that, although it's currently a prototype, a special radar to find them has been installed in Nemsys!"
drama_btm smile "If we clear the missions shown here, we can expand the radar's range! The more missions we clear, the stronger the radar will get!"
drama_top smile right "Wow, that's great! Let's try it out right away! Huh...!? Which button do I push?"
drama_btm neu rasis "Hawa, it's my first time using it too, so let's give it a practice run first!"
drama_top smile right "All right! Mission complete!"
drama_btm smile_gre rasis "Great workÅÙ By the way, you can check the mission requirements at the Track Select screen!"
drama_top neu left "Now that we know how to use the radar, should we go looking for those unstable factors?"
drama_btm neu rasis "Good idea... We'll look for the gravity they're putting out. Time to really put the Gravitational Radar to the test!"
mission_end in "Prologue: How To Use The Radar Å` END"
drama_top neu right "Rasis, did you find the unstable whatevers?"
drama_btm komaru rasis "UmmÅc C, could it be theseÅc? Hawawa, there sure are a lot of themÅ`ÅGÅG"
drama_top neu left "If they're bugs they might be hiding to avoid detection... Shall we head for the nearest response for the time being?"
drama_btm neu right "Yeah! When the going gets tough, the tough go away, is what they say after all!"
drama_top smile left "The tough get going, you mean. Even RIGHT says something right once in a while. Even if it's wrong."
drama_btm komaru rasis "You're right, we might find something if we go out there! Let's go!"
drama in bg02 "Volte Academy Å` Hallway"
drama_btm komaru left "Looks like some weak bugs snuck in. We defeated them, but..."
drama_top komaru right "These weren't the ones we were looking for after all... The radar signature isn't disappearing."
drama_top smile "But wow, this radar really does find bugs for usÅ`Å`ÅI I wonder if it can find test answers for me too?"
drama_btm komaru left "Please don't use it for thatÅ\ Make sure you actually study, okay?!"
drama_top smile rasis "Let's keep movingÅ\ back to looking for unstable factors! Back to the Gravity Radar!"
mission_end in "Prologue: About the Unstable Factors Å` END"
drama_top komaru rasis "Hawawa! A ton of bug signatures just appeared! They weren't there a moment ago! ÅÑÅÉ"
drama_btm neu left "...It looks like they're deliberately trying to get in our way. I suppose that means that whatever we're looking for must be intelligent."
drama_top komaru right "You mean they're not normal bugs...!? I'm not sure what they are, but they sure sound smart!"
drama_btm neu left "Perhaps even smarter than... Uh, never mind. In any case, what we have to do hasn't changed."
drama_top smile rasis "Yeah! If something gets in our way we'll just have to clean them out too! (ÅMÅEÉ÷ÅEÅL)…"
drama_btm smile right "All right, we've cleaned up that mess! Rasis, how does it look? Are there more bugs coming?"
drama_btm neu rasis "We've cleared up the radar responses! We might be able to find the source of the unstable factors now!"
drama_top smile left "Excellent, let's head straight there! Still, it looks like our opponents are a new type of bug... Once we take care of the source, we should head over and report it to Soul."
drama_btm smile rasis "You're right... But for now let's keep searching so we can protect our peaceful school lifeÅ`ÅI"
mission_end in "Prologue: Cleaning After School Å` END"
drama_top neu rasis "Alright! I've found the source of the unstable factors! Hawawa, a new track has been absorbed into its heart!"
drama_btm neu right "A new song?! All right! Where? Where is it!? Wait..."
drama_btm komaru "What the heck!? More bugs are showing up again!"
drama_top neu left "It appears that it's noticed us... fortunately, we haven't lost sight of it. If we act now...!"
drama_btm neu rasis "I'm concerned for the new track, so let's clear the mission and get even closer!"
drama_top smile right "All right! Leave it to me!"
drama_top neu right "Found you! Here's the source of the unsomething whatevers! Whoa, it really did absorb a new track!"
drama_btm komaru rasis "It looks like the power of track completions can activate Nemsys' standard self-repair systems! Let's hurry over and save it ÅÑÅÉ"
drama_top neu left "Yes, if that's what you want to do, Rasis, we'll do our best to help!"
drama in bg02 "Volte Academy Å` Hallway"
drama_top smile right "All rightÅ`! We beat it! And the track that was absorbed into the bug was input tooÅ`!"
drama_btm neu left "I've heard this radar was just a prototype... But if this new kind of bug is going to keep showing up, we'll need to improve our equipment right away."
drama_btm smile "But for now, I suppose the case is closed?"
drama_top smile_gre rasis "Thanks for the help, you two!"
drama_top komaru "But... Why is it that I still feel so uneasy...?"
drama_btm none "ÅcHmm. They're not as bad as I thought."
drama_btm "But don't you worryÅ\Å\Å\ I'll let you taste so much fear that you succumb."
drama_btm none "Providing power to everything in Console Nemsys, it is in the heart of their worldÅ\ and its core lies in the center of Volte Academy..."
drama in bg02 "Volte Academy Å` Hallway"
drama_top neu left "Å\Å\The Nemsys Core has a self-repair system, and keeps itself in working condition with the power of track completions."
drama_top neu "We can't overlook the existence of a new type of bug that can slip through the cracks in that system."
drama_btm neu right "Wow! So the Nemsys Core was in Volte Academy all along, huh?"
drama_top komaru left "Yes, Right... I guess you weren't paying attention in class after all."
drama_btm neu rasis "But at least we know now that the new bugs can be discovered using the Gravitational Radar!"
drama_btm smile "Let's track them down and take care of them directly!"
drama_top neu left "Of course. However, now that the new-type bugs are appearing in larger numbers, we're going to need some kind of strategy to deal with... Woah?!"
drama_btm surprise maxima "YOOOOOOO!!! I couldn't help but overhearÅ\Å\Å\Åô"
drama_btm surprise rasis "Hawa! Y-you surprised me!"
drama_top neu maxima "Your teacher can't ignore!! These new bugs either!!! So, behold!!! Gaze upon the research head's masterpieces!!!"
drama_top smile "To combat the bugs! I've prepared!! Battleships!!! Over theeeeerrrreeee!!!!"
drama_top komaru right "Over there? Over where?!"
drama_btm komaru left "Mr.Maxima, you were the head of the research department? (Oh no, I was so surprised that I asked about something totally unimportant!)"
drama_top komaru rasis "Hawawa... But then where's over there?"
drama_btm smile maxima "CHILDREN!!! Battleships, like your path in life, are things you must find on your own! Now! Run, youngsters!"
drama_btm "Though there might be obstacles in your way! DISCOVERYYYYYYY!!!"
drama_top neu rasis "O-okay! Got it! We'll use the radar!"
drama_btm komaru left "Oh dear. I suppose this means he's leaving the bugs along the way to us, then."
drama_top smile right "All right, let's do it! A battleship, huh? I wonder what it'll be like..."
mission_start in "Episode 1: Find the Nemsys Mothership!"
drama_top smile rasis "Mission complete! I guess neither your path in life nor a mothership comes eas... hawa!?"
drama_btm komaru right "Hm!? The battleship's signature... Moved!?"
drama_top komaru left "...It looks like there really will be obstacles in our way after all."
drama_top "If we don't defeat this bug, it doesn't look like we'll be able to nail down the location of the battleships."
drama_btm komaru rasis "Hawawa... I won't forgive them for disturbing the peace in our academy! I'll give it to 'em with the yet unknown power of these battleships!"
drama_top neu right "...Is it just me, or is Rasis really looking forward to these battleships?"
drama_btm neu left "It does appear that way... Let's do our best so we can find them quickly!"
mission_end in "Episode 1: Find the Nemsys Mothership! Å` END"
drama_top komaru rasis "Ha, hawa... Nobody told me this was going to happen!"
drama_btm komaru right "What's wrong, Rasis? Woah, that's a ton of bug signatures!"
drama_top komaru left "If we don't clean these up, finding the battleship's signature will be the least of our problems..."
drama_top "But doesn't this seem a lot like the new-type bugs we defeated last time?"
drama_btm komaru rasis "You're right... Last time the bugs suddenly grew in number, as if they were deliberately trying to get in our way..."
drama_top neu right "Who cares if they're a new type or they're ancient! I want to get in a battleship already!"
drama_btm neu left "If only they were all old... Right, you seem to be looking forward to the battleships too, I see?"
drama_top smile right "Of course! Who hasn't dreamt of piloting a battleship! Right, Rasis?"
drama_btm smile rasis "Yeah! I'm looking forward to piloting them!"
drama_top smile left "(Of course, I'm looking forward to it too...) Then it's all the more important that we hurry up and find it. Are you two ready?"
mission_start in "Episode 1: Identify the battleships' radar signature!"
drama_top smile rasis "Ping! Radar all green! I've found the location of the battleships! It's this room!"
drama_btm smile right "All right! Leave the door opening to me! (rattle rattle)"
drama_top komaru left "Can't you open it normally?! If there was someone inside, you'd be disturbing... Them..."
drama_btm surprise rasis "Hawa? Kureha? Sorry, we must have surprised you."
drama_top smile kureha "No worries. Hehe, It's a good thing I had just finished sharpening my katana."
drama_btm komaru left "Why were you in an empty classroom after school sharpening your... No, never mind. It's probably best I don't ask."
drama_top komaru right "Eh, forget that, where's the battleship? Weren't they supposed to be here!?"
drama_btm komaru rasis "Hawawa, the radar is pointing to Kureha...! What could this mean?"
drama_top neu left "Did we search for the wrong thing?"
drama_btm neu kureha "I have no idea what you're talking about... But that radar seems to have identified another target."
drama_btm smile "It looks like you're up to something interesting... Shall I come along too?"
drama_top neu right "Oh, you're right! There's a new reading! If we're going to defeat bugs, it'll be a big help to have Kureha at our side!"
drama_btm smile rasis "If the radar found Kureha... It must mean we need her help! Let's go together!"
drama_top smile kureha "Hehe... I'm not sure what's going on, but I'll do my best..."
drama_btm neu left "There's a good chance we'll run into new new-type bugs, so it's not going to be that easy... But very well then. Let's all head to that other signature!"
mission_end in "Episode 1: Identify the battleships' radar signature! Å` END"
drama_top neu rasis "Hawa, a call from Mr.Maxima!"
drama_btm neu right "Seriously? Sensei? Where's the battleship!? A hint! Give us a hint, pleaseÅ`Å`!"
drama_top surprise maxima "Fuuuuuuu!!! Non, non, RIGHT BOY! Dreams! You must! Grasp on your own!"
drama_btm neu left "I knew he'd say something like that... Wait? How'd he hear us talking about dreams earlier?"
drama_top neu maxima "SenseiÅôKnowsÅôEverything!!! Yes... Even that YOU folk forgot to bring a map!!! I've sent the map to the hangar over to the radarÅô"
drama_btm surprise rasis "Ha, hawa!? We did!? Why didn't you tell us sooner?"
drama_top komaru right "Woah, he's right- the location of the battleship hangar showed up on the map... It's in the direction of the signature after all!"
drama_btm neu kureha "I see. I'm starting to catch up. So you're looking for the battleships Mr.Maxima prepared for us..."
drama_top neu right "Yeah, yeah, exactly! Once we have those, the bugs will go boom! And the new-types will go bang!"
drama_btm komaru kureha "Hmm... So this will be useful against the new-type bugs?"
drama_top neu left "You actually understood what he said?!"
drama_btm komaru rasis "Hawawa... But there's a ton of bugs around the battleship signatures... ÅÑÅÉ If we don't defeat them, we won't be able to get close!"
drama_top komaru left "Uwah, while we were talking even more signatures appeared..."
drama_btm smile maxima "FUUUUUUUUU!!! Good luck, boys and girls!!!"
mission_start in "Episode 1: Find The Battleship Hangar!"
drama in bg02 "Volte Academy Å` Hallway"
drama_top smile right "All right! We made it past the bugs... And we're here, at the battleship hangar!"
drama_btm komaru rasis "Beyond this door are the battleships..."
drama_top komaru left "And some new-type bugs might be waiting for us as well...!"
drama_btm neu kureha "I'll open the door. If we keep dillydallying, they'll get away!"
mission_end in "Episode 1: Find the Battleship Hangar! Å` END"
drama_top smile right "Is that it!? Are those the battleships!? Woah, they're so big! So cool!!"
drama_btm komaru left "Right, calm down! Rasis, is this signal...?"
drama_top komaru rasis "Yes... There are new-type bugs lurking near the battleships! And there's a new track tangled up with them as well!"
drama_btm komaru right "What? Let's go save it!"
drama_top komaru kureha "Yeah... But, what is this... That's not all there is there. I feel a strange prescence..."
drama_top neu kureha "I feel like I now understand why the radar called out to me..."
drama_top smile_gre "If I defeat that, I can become even stronger... fufu..."
drama_btm komaru left "She certainly seems happy... (...I felt a chill go down my spine.)"
drama_top smile kureha "Rasis. Would you be so kind as to let me lead the charge?"
drama_btm surprise rasis "Hawa, Kureha seems really into it! All right, I'll leave it up to you!"
drama_top neu right "Wow, she's really cool! Rasis, let me help support her too!"
drama_btm smile rasis "Yeah! Let's all support her!"
mission_start in "Episode 1: Expel the new type of bugs!"
drama_top neu rasis "Ping! I've found the new-type bug!"
drama_btm smile_gre kureha "So the time has come... Are you all ready?"
drama_top neu right "The battleships are right there! Just wait a bit longer, new track!"
drama_btm neu left "We're fully prepared then? We'll charge the new-type bug! Keep your guard up, everyone!"
drama_btm smile_gre rasis "That's Kureha for you!! The new track is freed too!"
drama_top komaru right "*whisper* (She just kept happily chopping up bugs like it was nothing...)"
drama_btm komaru left "*whisper* (We didn't have anything to do... It's a little bit frustrating...)"
drama_top smile rasis "? Left, Right, what's wrong? The battleships are this way!"
drama_btm smile right "O-Oh! I'll be right there!"
drama_top komaru "Fuu. I'm glad we managed to make it to the Nemsys Mothership safely. Based on what we saw this time, it's clear now that the new type of bug is intelligent."
drama_top "Hopefully we'll be able to use the mothership to counterattack by the time the next wave comes..."
drama_btm smile right "Hey Left, hurry up! Let's explore the battleships!"
drama_top neu left "Hold on, I'm saying something that will set the stage for the next-"
drama_btm smile rasis "Left, hurry up! The cockpit is amazing!"
drama_top smile left "All right Rasis, I'll be right there!"
mission_end in "Episode 1: Expel the new type of bugs! Å` END"
drama_top neu tsumabuki "Oh...!? What's this? Select wormhole?"
drama_btm komaru kureha "Seems like something equipped on the battleship. The explanation seems to be in EPISODE 02?"
drama_btm smile "Anyway, I wonder if it's OK to choose EPISODE 2.."
drama_top neu tsumabuki "Well... All right, since it's the episode about operating the battleship, let's go!"
drama_btm none "The Nemsys Mothership... it stood sedately in a corner of Volte Academy."
drama_top komaru battle_rasis "Hawawa! I'm so busy with school I've been falling behind on my studies...!"
drama_btm neu tsumabuki "Hm, where's Right and Left? Make-up exams?"
drama_top neu battle_rasis "I'm not sure... But I'll practice my battleship even if I'm alone! It'll be so much fun... Oh, but I'll do my best to learn how to fight off the new types of bugs!"
drama_btm neu tsumabuki "Hey now, get a hold of yourself, navigator!"
drama_top neu battle_rasis "I don't need you to tell me to be serious about itÅ`! Now, let's turn it on!"
drama_btm smile_gre soul "Hey Rasis, long time no see! That thing you see there is the radar map installed in the Nemsys Mothership!"
drama_top surprise battle_rasis "Hawa, a transmission from Soul!"
drama_btm smile soul "I'll teach you how to operate it! Although it's just training, you'll be heading outside Volte Academy grounds, so don't let your guard down, and be sure to pay attention!"
drama_btm smile "The map will show you what wormholes you can currently sortie to! Use VOL-R to select the place you want to go,"
drama_top neu battle_rasis "And then push the START button, right?"
drama_btm smile_gre soul "Yep! You can also go to places you've already conquered. The clear status of each place will be shown on the bottom, so use that as a guide!"
drama_top smile battle_rasis "Got it! Thanks for the explanation, Soul! All right... Now let's go on our mission!"
mission_start in "Episode 2: Learn To Pilot A Battleship!"
drama in bg08 "Console Nemsys Å` Upper Atmosphere"
drama_top komaru battle_rasis "HauuÅ`! This is hard to control!"
drama_btm smile soul "No, no, you're doing great! As your instructor I'm really happy that- *kzzzzzzzzzz*"
drama_top neu battle_rasis "Soul? Sorry, I can't hear you very well..."
drama_btm komaru soul "Huh, *kzzzzz* the audio is- *click*"
drama_btm surprise tsumabuki "L, Look! Rasis! That!"
drama_top surprise battle_rasis "Hawa! There's a dark shadow in the sky!"
mission_end in "Episode 2: Learn To Pilot A Battleship! Å` END"
drama in bg10 "Console Nemsys Å` Upper Atmosphere"
drama_top komaru battle_rasis "Hawawa... The dark shadow is chasing us...!"
drama_btm surprise tsumabuki "Let's get out of here! Full steam ahead!"
drama_top komaru battle_rasis "I-It's no use! The radar isn't working! I've lost track of which way the academy is...!"
drama_btm komaru tsumabuki "You can't be serious! What are we supposed to do now!?"
drama_btm neu "...Hm? We're getting a transmission now?"
drama_btm surprise tsumabuki "W... Who are you-!?"
drama_top neu grace "My name is Grace; One who emerged from the distant chaos..."
drama_top neu "Hey, Rasis... Don't you want to know the truth behind this world?"
drama_top komaru tsumabuki "Hey, Rasis, now isn't the time to be shocked! A tidal wave of bugs is rushing over from that lady!"
drama_btm komaru battle_rasis "Hawawa... Yeah, I might still be in training, but I guess I'll have to do it...!"
drama_top neu tsumabuki "Just what you'd expect from something bearing the Nemsys name - Nemsys's bug-cleansing powers will work on this ship as well. All right, let's do it!"
mission_start in "Episode 2: Confront the mysterious invader!"
drama in bg09 "Console Nemsys Å` Upper Atmosphere"
drama_btm komaru tsumabuki "What are you doing!? If you let your guard down we'll be killed!"
drama_top surprise battle_rasis "I'm going after her - I found a track being dragged along by the herd of bugs! It'd be so sad if it drowned in them! Let's save it!"
drama_btm smile_gre tsumabuki "Not a moment of indecision - I like that attitude! Let's TRACK COMPLETE it and add it to our arsenal!"
drama in bg09 "Console Nemsys Å` Upper Atmosphere"
drama_top komaru soul "*crackle* Rasis! Are you all right?"
drama_btm komaru battle_rasis "Hawa, Soul! I'm okay! I-I'm under attack!"
drama_top surprise soul "Oh, the radio's working again! Is it the new type of bugs!?"
drama_btm komaru tsumabuki "We don't know! We don't know, but this one is shaped like a person! Like a woman in a lewd outfit!"
drama_top angry soul "What!? I kind of want to see... I mean, I'm calling Right and Left over as backup! Try to hang on until then!"
mission_end in "Episode 2: Confront the mysterious invader! Å` END"
drama in bg09 "Console Nemsys Å` Upper Atmosphere"
drama_top neu grace "Fufu, looks like you haven't quite mastered that weapon of yours yet, have you?"
drama_btm komaru battle_rasis "...You're... Controlling the new bugs aren't you!? Why would you do such a thing..."
drama_top komaru grace "Who knows? Why not look deep inside yourself for that answer?"
drama_btm komaru battle_rasis "Ah, ahhhhh! The attacks from the bugs won't stop! Defense, defense..."

drama_top neu tsumabuki "If we can just hold on a little longer, Right and Left will come to help us! The radar's back up, so let's keep the academy at our back! Don't let the bugs get close to the academy!
drama_btm neu battle_rasis "Okay! I'll get into a defensive position!"
mission_start in "Episode 2: Protect The School From Bugs!"
drama in bg09 "Console Nemsys Å` Upper Atmosphere"
drama_top surprise soul "...You're on VACATION!? At a time like THIS!? What are you doing, get back here right away!"
drama_btm komaru battle_rasis "HawaÅ`! I-is our backup here yet?"
drama_top angry soul "I just got in touch with them! I'll get them to come back right away, so... Ah, it's so frustrating to not be able to do anything to help!"
drama_btm komaru tsumabuki "I feel the same way... All right! Let's try to hold on just a little bit longer!"
drama_top neu grace "Fufufu... I'm not sure what you're trying to do, but it's not going to work!"
mission_end in "Episode 2: Protect The School From Bugs! Å` END"
drama in bg09 "Console Nemsys Å` Upper Atmosphere"
drama_top komaru battle_rasis "Hauu... I can't hold on any longer on my own!"
drama_btm neu grace "I only meant to test your strength... Fufu, I guess Nemsys's wonder child is nothing to be afraid of."
drama_btm neu "Perhaps I should bring it to an end right now...!"
drama_top neu aroha_right "Å\Å\I won't let you do that!"
drama_btm smile battle_rasis "Right! You came to save me!"
drama_top smile aroha_right "Sorry to keep you waiting, Rasis! Left should be coming soon too!"
drama_btm komaru tsumabuki "That's great to hear... But now's not the time! We need to do something about that lady!"
drama_top neu aroha_right "I know, I know! Rasis, can you do it?"
drama_btm smile battle_rasis "Yeah! Let's get up close to her and push back the herd of bugs!"
drama_top neu grace "Fufu... Do you really think it'll be that easy?"
mission_start in "Episode 2: Stop the mysterious invader!"
drama in bg09 "Console Nemsys Å` Upper Atmosphere"
drama_top smile aroha_right "All right, that went great! We took care of a ton of bugs!"
drama_btm neu battle_rasis "*ping* Hawawa! I feel the aura of a new track being born!"
drama_btm smile "The new track was awakened by Right's feelings... If we act now...!"
drama_top smile aroha_right "Yeah! Let's beat all the bugs and its true form will be reveled... Rebeeled...? Well, anyway, just leave it to me!"
drama in bg09 "Console Nemsys Å` Upper Atmosphere"
drama_top komaru grace "N..new tracks appearing at this timing?!"
drama_top komaru "This will do for now - I know what you're capable of now. So I'll let you off easy for today..."
drama_btm komaru aroha_right "W-Wait! Who are you...?"
drama_top neu aroha_left "Let's not chase after her. Rasis, you need to rest."
drama_btm komaru aroha_right "Left! What took you so long?"

drama_top komaru aroha_left "Ku... You're absolutely right - I have no excuse. I just couldn't take my eyes off the namahage at the festival...! For now, we've got the radio back up, so let's head back to Volte Academy... Rasis?"
drama_btm komaru battle_rasis "Hawa, I'm fine! I'm just a little tired..."
drama_top neu aroha_left "Well, okay, but if you can't go any further let us know, okay?"
drama_btm komaru "(That girl, Grace... She looked a lot like me.)"
drama_btm komaru "(She knew my name... Who could she be?)"
mission_end in "Episode 2: Stop the mysterious invader! END"
drama_btm neu left "Yes, hello, this is Left..."
drama_top smile right "Hey, Left! It's your big bro!"
drama_btm komaru left "Why are you calling me when I'm right next to you?"
drama_top neu right "I don't really know. That's just what it said to do right here."
drama_top neu right "I just picked up a... photobook? That was lying here on the ground. See? It says right here..."
drama_btm neu left "What's that photo...? 'GW Bullet Tour'? Didn't Golden Week end quite a while ago?"
drama_top neu right "It probably stands for Gravity Wars, don't you think?"
drama_top smile right "No, I'm pretty sure it's 'Gravity Wars Bullet Tour', don't you think?"
drama_btm komaru left "Right now!? Wait, are you even packed!?"
mission_start in "SIDE 01Å@Let's prepare for the trip!"
drama_top neu aroha_right "Woah, that's Left for you! I've never seen a vacation plan this deta-- derailed!"
drama_btm smile aroha_left "You were on the right track with 'detailed'! Hehe, this is my super obsessive ultra-recommended plan, after all."
drama_top smile aroha_right "I knew you were amazing, Left! All right! Time to go on vacation!"
drama_btm neu aroha_left "...My plan was flawless after all. We've just gotta start by having soup curry..."
mission_end in "SIDE 01Å@Let's prepare for the trip!Å@END"
drama_top neu aroha_left "Looks like the radar will come in handy on vacation, too. Let's start heading to our first destination."
drama_btm neu aroha_right "This radar does everything! All right, let's make tons of memories!"
drama_top komaru aroha_left "Let's make sure we have our tickets and fashion... Oh, there aren't any in Volte? I see..."
drama_top neu aroha_left "Fuu... I've really enjoyed myself. The Nebuta Festival was quite the sight."
drama_btm neu aroha_right "We went to all kinds of places! Hm? I've got a lot of missed calls from SOUL..."
